text: "Misery" is a song by English rock band the Beatles. It is on their first album Please Please Me in 1963. It was written by John Lennon and Paul McCartney. Lennon said he wrote most of the song, and McCartney said they both helped write it together. The song was written in January 1963, and recorded in March 1963. ==References== ==Sources== * * * Category:The Beatles songs Category:1963 songs
title: Misery (Beatles song)
